name: Russian Golf
description:
Launch matryoshkas to reach the goal. Dolls cannot be stacked in reverse order - keep track of where each size doll is to ensure you can combine them back together when needed!

WASD to walk

Hold left mouse to aim, release to fire. Right mouse click to cancel shot.

R to restart if you get stuck.

Blue blocks are bouncy, and buttons will cause some platforms to move/stop moving.

(If you're really bad and get stuck you can use "Page Up" to skip a level)
